header.note: Google places strick character limits on the various text fields in Google Play. The title is 30 characters, the short description is 80 characters, and the rest of the strings, which all go together in the description, are limited to 4000 characters.

trans-unit.source: OONI Probe
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Google to 30 characters

trans-unit.source: Measure Internet Censorship, Speed & Performance
trans-unit.target: Измерить цензуру в Интернете, скорость и качество соединения.
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Google to 80 characters

trans-unit.source: OONI Probe - Measure Internet Censorship & Speed
trans-unit.target: OONI Probe - измеряйте интернет-цензуру и скорость
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Apple to 50 characters

trans-unit.source: Measure Internet Censorship
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Apple to 30 characters

trans-unit.source: Collect evidence of internet censorship. Measure the speed and performance of your network.
trans-unit.target: Собирайте доказательства интернет-цензуры. Измеряйте скорость и производительность вашей сети.
trans-unit.note: This is limited by Apple to 170 characters

trans-unit.source: Are websites and social media apps blocked? Is your network unusually slow? Run OONI Probe to find out!

With this app, you will examine the blocking of websites and instant messaging apps, measure your network's speed and performance, and check whether systems that could be responsible for censorship and surveillance are in your network.
trans-unit.target: С помощью этого приложения вы сможете исследовать блокировки веб-сайтов и мессенджеров, измерять скорость и производительность вашей сети и проверять наличие в вашей сети систем, отвечающих за цензуру и слежку.

trans-unit.source: OONI Probe is developed by the Open Observatory of Network Interference (OONI), a free software project (under The Tor Project) that aims to uncover internet censorship around the world.
trans-unit.target: OONI Probe разрабатывается Открытой Обсерваторией Сетевых Помех (Open Observatory of Network Interference, OONI). OONI Probe является свободным программным обеспечением (в рамках The Tor Project), направленное на раскрытие фактов интернет-цензуры во всем мире.

trans-unit.source: Since 2012, OONI’s global community has collected millions of network measurements from more than 200 countries, shedding light on multiple cases of network interference.
trans-unit.target: С 2012 года мировое сообщество OONI собрало миллионы сетевых измерений из более чем 200 стран, проливая свет на многочисленные случаи сетевых помех.

trans-unit.source: By running OONI Probe, you can help increase transparency of internet censorship.
Collect evidence of internet censorship
You can check whether and how websites and instant messaging apps are blocked. The network measurement data you will collect may serve as evidence of internet censorship.
trans-unit.target: Вы можете проверить, заблокированы ли веб-сайты и мессенджеры и каким образом. Данные измерения сети, которые вы собираете, могут служить доказательством цензуры в интернете.

trans-unit.source: Detect systems responsible for censorship and surveillance
trans-unit.target: Обнаруживайте системы, отвечающие за цензуру и слежку

trans-unit.source: OONI Probe tests are also designed to uncover the presence of systems (middleboxes) that could be responsible for censorship and surveillance.
Measure the speed and performance of your network
trans-unit.target: Измеряйте скорость и работоспособность вашей сети

trans-unit.source: You can measure the speed and performance of your network by running OONI's implementation of the Network Diagnostic Test (NDT). You can also measure video streaming performance with the Dynamic Adaptive Streaming over HTTP (DASH) test.
Open data

OONI publishes network measurement data because open data allows third parties to verify OONI findings, conduct independent studies, and answer other research questions. Openly publishing OONI data also helps increase transparency of internet censorship around the world. You can explore and download OONI data here: https://ooni.io/data/
Free software

All OONI Probe tests (including our NDT and DASH implementations), are based on free and open source software. You can find OONI software projects on GitHub: https://github.com/ooni. Curious to learn how OONI Probe tests work? Learn more: https://ooni.io/nettest/
To receive updates from the OONI-verse, follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/OpenObservatory
Detect internet censorship and test your network's speed and performance
Uncover evidence of internet censorship
Run a sophisticated network speed and diagnostics test
trans-unit.target: Запускайте сложные тесты скорости соединения и диагностику сети

trans-unit.source: Easily discover which websites are blocked on your network
trans-unit.target: С лёгкостью определяйте, какие сайты заблокированы в вашей сети

trans-unit.source: Testing your network is fun with a friendly octopus!
trans-unit.target: Тестировать сеть это прикольно, особенно в компании дружелюбного осьминога!

trans-unit.source: The Open Observatory of Network Interference (OONI) is a global observation network for detecting internet censorship and other forms of network interference around the world.
